summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Harris Place, from Hinds Street to Horton Street; and Hinds Street, from 24th Avenue South to Harris Place; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6831 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
